se.jguru.nazgul.core.cache.api.distributed.async

Interface DistributedExecutor<K,V>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Cache<K,V>, Clusterable, DistributedCache<K,V>, Iterable<K>, Serializable

    public interface DistributedExecutor<K,V>
extends DistributedCache<K,V>
    Service interface definition for a distributed (clustered) cache which can execute Tasks on Nodes within a distributed cache. If the underlying cache provides the ExecutorService capability, this is the interface specifying how to interact with it.
    Author:
    Lennart Jörelid, jGuru Europe AB

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface se.jguru.nazgul.core.cache.api.distributed.DistributedCache
